title: Little Deadly Secrets
description: From USA Today best-selling author Pamela Crane comes an addictive domestic suspense novel about three best friends, two unforgivable sins, and a murder.Mackenzie, Robin, and Lily have been best friends for a long time, sharing life's ups and downs and growing even closer as the years have gone by. Each of them thinks they know everything about one another, but as they're about to discover, they're each harboring secrets....Mackenzie would die for those she loves, but a part of her is already dead at the hands of her husband.Robin would carry everyone's burdens if she could, but she's crumbling under the weight of motherhood and debt.Lily would fight to the death for her friends, but lately, she can't help feeling no one's got her back as her addiction threatens to destroy her.Nothing could come between these three best friends....Except for a betrayal.Nothing could turn them against each other....Except for a terrible past mistake.Nothing could tear them apart....Except for murder.
author: Pamela Crane
